name: Endless Glory
description:
The main goal of the game is continuous progression through stages, achievable through strategic management.
Strengthen your army in every possible way and advance further on the path to endless glory!

Gameplay

First and foremost, you will need to recruit units into your army.
Choose your units wisely. Each unit has different characteristics with both strengths and weaknesses. After assembling your army, battles become accessible.
In battles, your army fight with enemies automatically. Upon victory over enemy units and completion of each stage, you earn gold, which can be used to enhance your army.
The strongest players will be shown on the leaderboard.

Features

Direct control over units is not available, so you need to strengthen your army through other means:
1) By upgrading skills, you can improve the characteristics of your units.
2) After acquiring spells, you can use them in battle to enhance your units or harm the enemy.
3) In the armory, you can purchase and equip items that provide additional capabilities to your units and enhance their characteristics.
4) You can also appoint a general to your army, who will strengthen specific aspects of your units or provide additional abilities, not presented before.

Challenges

Once an hour, you can undertake challenge. In a challenge your army faces big wave of reinforced enemies. Winning in this trials rewards you with gold and crystals, which can be spent in a separate shop to acquire unique additional capabilities to aid you in battles. Challenges also progress with the strength of your army, allowing you to advance further and further.
